incidents.name: Upcoming Changes to International Short Codes and Alphanumeric Sender IDs For AT&T Mexico

incident_updates.body: As there is currently no customer impact, we are marking this Status Post as resolved. We will be informing Twilio customers about the upcoming commercial changes and the migration process updates in the next few days.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Due to commercial changes and the conclusion of AT&T Mexico's exclusive International A2P contract, all dedicated short codes and registered alphanumeric sender IDs for international customers may be affected starting October 1st. Until the migration to a new partner is complete, short codes and alphanumeric sender IDs are expected to be replaced. Despite these changes, message delivery will remain uninterrupted. We appreciate your understanding during this transition and will keep you updated on the migration process.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an Issue With Bundle Creation

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the bundle creation issue, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with selecting a country when creating a bundle. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in Taiwan for a Subset of Long code

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS was degraded for 171 minutes between 09:15 and 12:05 Pacific Time on 09/25/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in Taiwan for a Subset of Long code. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Claro Network in Brazil

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS was degraded for 33 minutes between 12:15 and 12:45 Pacific Time on 09/25/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced SMS Delivery Delays to Claro Network in Brazil. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Programmable Messaging affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Messaging was affected for 1 hour and 22 minutes between 06:41 and 08:03 Pacific Time on 08/25/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to KDDI Network in Japan for a Subset of Longcodes and Alphanumeric Sender IDs. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Provisioner affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Provisioner was degraded for 733 minutes between 21:18 on 09/25/2024 and 09:31 on 09/26/2024 Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced Error 500 when submitting 10DLC and Toll-Free provisioning requests. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification and Short Codes, PN Provisioning, Pricing Page API and Flex Studio Systems are Impacted

incident_updates.body: The TrustHub, Regulatory Compliance, A2P Compliance, Toll-Free Verification, Pricing Page API, Short Codes system, PN Provisioning, and Flex Studio are fully functional again. This incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: TWILIO PLATFORM - Other

We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Wind Tre Network in Italy for a Subset of Long Codes

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Wind Tre network and Tim Network in Italy for a subset of long codes. This incident has been resolved.

incidents.name: Stale Data in Messaging Insights

incident_updates.body: Twilio Messaging Insights was degraded for 430 minutes between 15:20 Pacific Time on 09/18/2024 and 22:30 Pacific Time on 09/18/2024. During this period of time customers may have seen stale data in Messaging Insights when querying for data in this time range. The issue has now been resolved.
